refnamediv.refpurpose: Checks given system function is linearphase or not

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: flag = islinphase(b,a) flag = islinphase(sos) flag = islinphase(...,tol)

listitem.para: Coefficients of numerator polynomial of system function
Coefficients of denumerator polynomial of system function
Second order section matrix of order Kx6
Tolerence in similarities between two numbers in phase response
This function returns logical 1 if system is linear phase (flag = 1)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function takes input a System function in terms of numerator and denumerator coefficients or in second order section (sos) matrix and checks for system having Linear Phase Response or not

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.para: Checking given system function is linear-phase or not
refsection.programlisting: b = [0 1 2 2 1 0] ; //Numerator polynomial coefficients a = 1 ; //Denumerator polynomial coefficients flag = islinphase(b,a) //This is an example of Symmetric FIR Filter which is Linear Phase, hence it will give output : flag = 1
